<a id="TextureProgressBar"></a>

# TextureProgressBar

**Inherits:** [Range](Range.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Texture-based progress bar. Useful for loading screens and life or stamina bars.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

TextureProgressBar works like [ProgressBar](ProgressBar.md), but uses up to 3 textures instead of Redot's [Theme](Theme.md) resource. It can be used to create horizontal, vertical and radial progress bars.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **FillMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode)

<a id="TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_LEFT_TO_RIGHT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](TextureProgressBar.md#enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_LEFT_TO_RIGHT** = `0`

The [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) fills from left to right.<a id="TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_RIGHT_TO_LEFT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](TextureProgressBar.md#enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_RIGHT_TO_LEFT** = `1`

The [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) fills from right to left.<a id="TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_TOP_TO_BOTTOM"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](TextureProgressBar.md#enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_TOP_TO_BOTTOM** = `2`

The [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) fills from top to bottom.<a id="TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_BOTTOM_TO_TOP"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](TextureProgressBar.md#enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_BOTTOM_TO_TOP** = `3`

The [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) fills from bottom to top.<a id="TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_CLOCKWISE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](TextureProgressBar.md#enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_CLOCKWISE** = `4`

Turns the node into a radial bar. The [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) fills clockwise. See [radial_center_offset](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_center_offset), [radial_initial_angle](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_initial_angle) and [radial_fill_degrees](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_fill_degrees) to control the way the bar fills up.<a id="TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](TextureProgressBar.md#enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE** = `5`

Turns the node into a radial bar. The [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) fills counterclockwise. See [radial_center_offset](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_center_offset), [radial_initial_angle](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_initial_angle) and [radial_fill_degrees](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_fill_degrees) to control the way the bar fills up.<a id="TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_BILINEAR_LEFT_AND_RIGHT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](TextureProgressBar.md#enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_BILINEAR_LEFT_AND_RIGHT** = `6`

The [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) fills from the center, expanding both towards the left and the right.<a id="TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_BILINEAR_TOP_AND_BOTTOM"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](TextureProgressBar.md#enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_BILINEAR_TOP_AND_BOTTOM** = `7`

The [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) fills from the center, expanding both towards the top and the bottom.<a id="TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_CLOCKWISE_AND_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FillMode](TextureProgressBar.md#enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode) **FILL_CLOCKWISE_AND_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE** = `8`

Turns the node into a radial bar. The [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) fills radially from the center, expanding both clockwise and counterclockwise. See [radial_center_offset](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_center_offset), [radial_initial_angle](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_initial_angle) and [radial_fill_degrees](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_fill_degrees) to control the way the bar fills up.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_fill_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **fill_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_fill_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fill_mode**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_fill_mode**\ (\ )

The fill direction. See [FillMode](TextureProgressBar.md#enum_TextureProgressBar_FillMode) for possible values.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_nine_patch_stretch"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **nine_patch_stretch** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_nine_patch_stretch)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_nine_patch_stretch**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_nine_patch_stretch**\ (\ )

If ``true``, Redot treats the bar's textures like in [NinePatchRect](NinePatchRect.md). Use the ``stretch_margin_*`` properties like [stretch_margin_bottom](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_stretch_margin_bottom) to set up the nine patch's 3Ã—3 grid. When using a radial [fill_mode](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_fill_mode), this setting will only enable stretching for [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress), while [texture_under](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_under) and [texture_over](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_over) will be treated like in [NinePatchRect](NinePatchRect.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_radial_center_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **radial_center_offset** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_center_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_radial_center_offset**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_radial_center_offset**\ (\ )

Offsets [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) if [fill_mode](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_fill_mode) is [FILL_CLOCKWISE](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_CLOCKWISE), [FILL_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE), or [FILL_CLOCKWISE_AND_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_CLOCKWISE_AND_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE).

\ **Note:** The effective radial center always stays within the [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) bounds. If you need to move it outside the texture's bounds, modify the [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) to contain additional empty space where needed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_radial_fill_degrees"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **radial_fill_degrees** = `360.0` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_fill_degrees)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fill_degrees**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_fill_degrees**\ (\ )

Upper limit for the fill of [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) if [fill_mode](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_fill_mode) is [FILL_CLOCKWISE](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_CLOCKWISE), [FILL_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE), or [FILL_CLOCKWISE_AND_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_CLOCKWISE_AND_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE). When the node's ``value`` is equal to its ``max_value``, the texture fills up to this angle.

See [Range.value](Range.md#Range_property_value), [Range.max_value](Range.md#Range_property_max_value).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_radial_initial_angle"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **radial_initial_angle** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_initial_angle)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_radial_initial_angle**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_radial_initial_angle**\ (\ )

Starting angle for the fill of [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) if [fill_mode](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_fill_mode) is [FILL_CLOCKWISE](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_CLOCKWISE), [FILL_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE), or [FILL_CLOCKWISE_AND_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_constant_FILL_CLOCKWISE_AND_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE). When the node's ``value`` is equal to its ``min_value``, the texture doesn't show up at all. When the ``value`` increases, the texture fills and tends towards [radial_fill_degrees](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_fill_degrees).

\ **Note:** [radial_initial_angle](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_radial_initial_angle) is wrapped between ``0`` and ``360`` degrees (inclusive).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_stretch_margin_bottom"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **stretch_margin_bottom** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_stretch_margin_bottom)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_stretch_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side), value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_stretch_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The height of the 9-patch's bottom row. A margin of 16 means the 9-slice's bottom corners and side will have a height of 16 pixels. You can set all 4 margin values individually to create panels with non-uniform borders. Only effective if [nine_patch_stretch](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_nine_patch_stretch) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_stretch_margin_left"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **stretch_margin_left** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_stretch_margin_left)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_stretch_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side), value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_stretch_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The width of the 9-patch's left column. Only effective if [nine_patch_stretch](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_nine_patch_stretch) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_stretch_margin_right"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **stretch_margin_right** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_stretch_margin_right)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_stretch_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side), value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_stretch_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The width of the 9-patch's right column. Only effective if [nine_patch_stretch](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_nine_patch_stretch) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_stretch_margin_top"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **stretch_margin_top** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_stretch_margin_top)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_stretch_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side), value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_stretch_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The height of the 9-patch's top row. Only effective if [nine_patch_stretch](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_nine_patch_stretch) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_texture_over"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **texture_over** [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_over)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_over_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_over_texture**\ (\ )

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) that draws over the progress bar. Use it to add highlights or an upper-frame that hides part of [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **texture_progress** [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_progress_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_progress_texture**\ (\ )

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) that clips based on the node's ``value`` and [fill_mode](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_fill_mode). As ``value`` increased, the texture fills up. It shows entirely when ``value`` reaches ``max_value``. It doesn't show at all if ``value`` is equal to ``min_value``.

The ``value`` property comes from [Range](Range.md). See [Range.value](Range.md#Range_property_value), [Range.min_value](Range.md#Range_property_min_value), [Range.max_value](Range.md#Range_property_max_value).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **texture_progress_offset** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture_progress_offset**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_texture_progress_offset**\ (\ )

The offset of [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress). Useful for [texture_over](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_over) and [texture_under](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_under) with fancy borders, to avoid transparent margins in your progress texture.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_texture_under"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **texture_under** [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_under)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_under_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_under_texture**\ (\ )

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) that draws under the progress bar. The bar's background.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_tint_over"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **tint_over** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_tint_over)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_tint_over**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_tint_over**\ (\ )

Multiplies the color of the bar's [texture_over](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_over) texture. The effect is similar to [CanvasItem.modulate](CanvasItem.md#CanvasItem_property_modulate), except it only affects this specific texture instead of the entire node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_tint_progress"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **tint_progress** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_tint_progress)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_tint_progress**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_tint_progress**\ (\ )

Multiplies the color of the bar's [texture_progress](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_progress) texture.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_property_tint_under"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **tint_under** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_property_tint_under)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_tint_under**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_tint_under**\ (\ )

Multiplies the color of the bar's [texture_under](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_texture_under) texture.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="TextureProgressBar_method_get_stretch_margin"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_stretch_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_method_get_stretch_margin)

Returns the stretch margin with the specified index. See [stretch_margin_bottom](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_stretch_margin_bottom) and related properties.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureProgressBar_method_set_stretch_margin"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_stretch_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side), value\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TextureProgressBar_method_set_stretch_margin)

Sets the stretch margin with the specified index. See [stretch_margin_bottom](TextureProgressBar.md#TextureProgressBar_property_stretch_margin_bottom) and related properties.
